subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After an improbable trek to to the N.F.L. that included jobs delivering pizzas and working security at a Best Buy, Greg White led the Buccaneers in sacks as a 28-year-old rookie.
snippet: After an improbable trek to to the N.F.L. that included jobs delivering pizzas and working security at a Best Buy, Greg White led the Buccaneers in sacks as a 28-year-old rookie.
